extendedInfo.description: Introducing our newest writer: Pauzle! "Popcorn, Soda ... Murder?" is a thrilling text-based multiple-choice murder mystery. Can you find all the clues at the murder scene and piece together who must have done it and how?

reviews.title: I\'ll try not to spoil the end...
reviews.comment: But it\'s absurd. After all that evidence pointing straight at _______ (insert name of culprit), no to mention all the wrong answers you probably got on the preliminary deduction, one wrong answer and it\'s suddenly Benjamin thinks it\'s a suicide. I get its supposed to be end-of-the-game-highstakes kind of thing, but maybe we should have three tries instead of one. Or just tell ME how to prove him wrong and I\'ll be content.
reviews.author: paul nathan

reviews.title: Let down
reviews.comment: I guessed the murderer, got to the end then clicked a wrong choice and had to restart the whole thing. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Would like to see more mysteries after the movie theater murder, but love it! (And btw, you don\'t HAVE to take notes, just be smart and remember things.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boooring
reviews.comment: This game is so boring downloaded played all of two mins and couldnt take anymore if you have to take notes whilst playing a game then that says it all!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Spoiler Alert Alan gets arrested. Nail him with Louis calling him to the projection room. Then that Helena would have seen him. Nail him changing reel
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really fun!
reviews.comment: I enjoyed playing this and found the culprit! Except that he was guilty and they thought the murder was a suicide so he was let go. So that really sucked.  Recommend to anyone who likes mysteries.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HATE IT!
reviews.comment: HATE IT HATE IT HATE IT HATE IT!!!!!!! Sorry I said that, but it\'s true. Why make the person play it again?! You can send them back to the part to find an error or somewhere a little before. JEEZ!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Malie Heine

reviews.title: Flat Boring and Confusing
reviews.comment: The writing in this is very poor and the way the evidence is presented is confusing and quite unrealistic. The whole game is based of of guessing more than critical thinking. Not to mention having to start completely over after messing up. It didn\'t feel like a genuine detective game at all. No suspense and no good characters or plot changes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Story!!!
reviews.comment: The plot is well written, except that trying the whole thing all over can be tedious, like other players said... BUT, If you screwed it at the very end, why don\'t you just Google for the final truth...?  It is hard and harsh (but only if you decide to try it all over after failure, not me, lol), but by far the most loved interactive novel for me! ;D
reviews.author: Louisa Poon

reviews.title: Okay...
reviews.comment: Needs to be longer, not have Ben contradict himself in then end where if you guess wrong and lose, change murders or at least suspects
reviews.author: lee leavelle

reviews.title: Murder
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome and found the culprit he said it was suiside so I let him go but it took me 4 tries and I didn\'t play the game but next time I do ill say it wasn\'t suiside. Also my whole family\'s playing it over and over again and I wrote notes hint 1 minute is murder
reviews.author: Dominique Smith

reviews.title: Brilliant esp as a free app!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t even notice any adverts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fun,but...
reviews.comment: i got stuck while intrviewing serge..cant get past it pls help....
reviews.author: rajvi khanna

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: I lked it but at d end Alan was d culprit cuz he was blame for d suicide I wasn\'t expectn dat n it kind of didn\'t mke sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game ever!
reviews.comment: By far the best game on the app store! Best game I ever played Omg I loved it
reviews.author: Jemmar Jackson

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Played and enjoyed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovvvvve this game!
reviews.comment: Wow its really challenging to figure it out but the more u play the more it makes sense I love it more like it please :)
reviews.author: Tylar Miller

reviews.title: Devastating!!!
reviews.comment: I was almost done solving this mystery and the game froze after unlocking my phones\' screensaver!!! Accckkk!!! :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great except...
reviews.comment: This was a detailed well thought out crime story, and was interesting to play. The only thing was that in the end if you don\'t guess the right inconsistency in the killer\'s story the murder is ruled as suicide and you have to start ALL OVER AGAIN if you want to complete the whole thing. I played this 7 times to get the whole ending; you should be glad I had so much patience. Of course taking notes is also an option but that is also very tedious. Please make it in the end you get more chances to guess so people don\'t die of frustration, ;D thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kewl
reviews.comment: Awesomeness
reviews.author: A Google User
